/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars of different shapes and colors are parked along the sides of the street, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
